title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 04 July 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:45 <polx> has quit  
01:09 <jvdrean> has quit  
02:35 <tekzilla> has quit  
02:37 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
06:03 <sburjan`> has quit  
06:03 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
07:16 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
07:35 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:09 <vmassol> good morning, we really need to fix our tests, they're failing a lot these days  
08:09 <vmassol> http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/  
08:09 <vmassol> has anyone analyzed the problems?  
08:10 <vmassol> mflorea: is it just the fact that XE doesn't start fast enough?  
08:10 <vmassol> I see this is true for misc tests: http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-misc/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-misc/1627/testReport/org.xwiki.test.integration/XWikiTestSetup/junit\_framework\_TestSuite\_761eec35/?  
08:11 <vmassol> indeed seems to be the same for others too  
08:11 <+mflorea> most of them fail because XE takes too long to start. I don't reproduce the problem locally. For me it starts in a few second, nowhere near 120s limit  
08:12 <+mflorea> I marked the agents offline and I'm waiting for Guillaume to restart them, If this doesn't solve the problem I'll investigate further  
08:16 <vmassol> ok  
08:41 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
08:53 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
09:11 <jvdrean> has quit  
09:31 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:34 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:37 <sburjan> has quit  
09:37 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:47 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:57 <vmassol> has quit  
10:13 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
10:15 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
11:02 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:18 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:38 <vmassol> hi guys, I'm ready to remove the old chart plugin (have it done locally). All I'm waiting for is an agreement… ;) (see devs list)  
11:50 <+AndreasJonsson> vmassol:  ChartingAction, which is part of the old plugin, is still used by the new chart macro.  
11:51 <vmassol> AndreasJonsson: ah thanks, I didn't know this, I'll keep that one for the moment then  
11:51 <vmassol> hmmm  
11:51 <vmassol> it calls the plugin api  
11:52 <vmassol> damned!  
11:52 <vmassol> :)  
11:53 <vmassol> seems like we really need my xwiki-action module ready ;)  
11:53 <vmassol> FTM I guess we can move the required code out of the plugin  
11:53 <vmassol> and keep a ChartingAction  
11:54 <vmassol> let me do a first step by moving the chart plugin out of oldcore  
12:40 <mflorea> has quit  
13:16 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
13:16 <polx\_> has quit  
13:20 <polx> has quit  
14:05 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:05 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
14:28 <@sdumitriu> AndreasJonsson, vmassol: The ChartingAction should be replaced by the TempResourceAction  
14:29 <vmassol> sdumitriu: ok, thanks for the tip  
14:29 <vmassol> I'm going to do a first step which is to extract the plugin from oldcore  
15:10 <polx> has quit

20:19 <vmassol> cjd: "We're pleased to announce the first Paris Cassandra Meetup! 7pm on July 25th at http://twitter.com/lecamping. Speakers: http://twitter.com/pcmanus and http://twitter.com/pyr http://t.co/DQveJpJM" Too bad we'll be at the seminar ;)
